title: Prosciutto Arugula Pizza
summary: The recipe Prosciutto Arugula Pizza could satisfy your Mediterranean craving in around 45 minutes. This recipe serves 3 and costs $2.64 per serving. This main course has 634 calories, 17g of protein, and 36g of fat per serving. 5 people have made this recipe and would make it again. Head to the store and pick up prosciutto di parma, truffle infused olive oil, parmesan, and a few other things to make it today. To use up the pizza dough you could follow this main course with the Grilled Dessert Pizza as a dessert. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 26%. This score is rather bad. Try Prosciutto Arugula Pizza, Fig-Prosciutto Pizza with Arugula, and Prosciutto and Arugula Pizza for similar recipes.

winePairing.pairingText: Italian can be paired with Chianti, Trebbiano, and Verdicchio. Italians know food and they know wine. Trebbiano and Verdicchio are Italian white wines that pair well with fish and white meat, while Chianti is a great Italian red for heavier, bolder dishes. The Rodano Vigna Viacosta Chianti Classico with a 4.4 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 30 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Rodano Vigna Viacosta Chianti Classico
productMatches.description: Deep concentration of Sangiovese flavors of classic cherry, earth and a hint of smoky pistachio nuts. Made with 100% Sangiovese.
